name: Breadcrumb
description: A breadcrumb is used to show hierarchy between content.

props.name: Breadcrumb.Divider
props.description: A divider sub-component for Breadcrumb component.

props.name: Breadcrumb.Section
props.description: A section sub-component for Breadcrumb component.

name: Form
description: A Form displays a set of related user input fields in a structured way.

props.name: Form.Field
props.description: A field is a form element containing a label and an input.

props.name: Form.Button
props.description: Sugar for <Form.Field control={Button} />.

props.name: Form.Checkbox
props.description: Sugar for <Form.Field control={Checkbox} />.

props.name: Form.Dropdown
props.description: Sugar for <Form.Field control={Dropdown} />.

props.name: Form.Group
props.description: A set of fields can appear grouped together.

props.name: Form.Input
props.description: Sugar for <Form.Field control={Input} />.

props.name: Form.Radio
props.description: Sugar for <Form.Field control={Radio} />.

props.name: Form.Select
props.description: Sugar for <Form.Field control={Select} />.

props.name: Form.TextArea
props.description: Sugar for <Form.Field control={TextArea} />.

name: Grid
description: A grid is used to harmonize negative space in a layout.

props.name: Grid.Column
props.description: A column sub-component for Grid.

props.name: Grid.Row
props.description: A row sub-component for Grid.

name: Menu
description: A menu displays grouped navigation actions.

props.name: Menu.Header
props.description: A menu item may include a header or may itself be a header.

props.name: Menu.Item
props.description: A menu can contain an item.

props.name: Menu.Menu
props.description: A menu can contain a sub menu.

name: Message
description: A message displays information that explains nearby content.

props.name: Message
props.description: A message can contain a content.

props.name: Message
props.description: A message can contain a header.

props.name: Message
props.description: A message can contain a list of items.

props.name: Message
props.description: A message list can contain an item.

name: Table
description: A table displays a collections of data grouped into rows.

props.name: Table.Cell
props.description: A table row can have cells.

props.name: Table.Footer
props.description: A table can have a footer.

props.name: Table.Header
props.description: A table can have a header.

props.name: Table.HeaderCell
props.description: A table can have a header cell.

props.name: Table.Row
props.description: A table can have rows.
